content: *our crochet apron towel and dishcloth bring a bit of retro cool into the kitchen makes an ideal gift for housewarming or bridal shower lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50304 skill level easy level 2 **apron** 20 wide x 23 long 51 x 58 5 cm excluding ties **towel** 17-1/4 x 27 44 x 68 5 cm including edging **dish cloth** 11 wide x 9-1/2 high 28 x 24 cm including edging lion® cotton article #760 a 5 balls b 3 balls *2 colors 8 balls total* *materials are sufficient to make all items in the set* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge apron and towel 12 single_crochet + 13 row = 4 10 cm in single_crochet u s dish cloth 10 5 stitches = 4 10 cm in pattern crochet over color not in use when working checkerboard pattern apron finishing with large-eyed blunt needle and mc sew 3 edges of pocket lining to ws of apron work trim and neck loop to finish
